Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMajor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMinor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="DeviceTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

Event.Message: Name caching for File System Filters has been disabled on volume '%3'.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ExtraStringLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExtraString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ExtraStringLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Filter Manager failed to attach to volume '%3'. This volume will be unavailable for filtering until a reboot. The final status was %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ExtraStringLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExtraString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ExtraStringLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: File System Filter '%5' (Version %2.%3, %6) failed to attach to volume '%8'. The filter returned a non-standard final status of %1. This filter and/or its supporting applications should handle this condition. If this condition persists, contact the vendor.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMajor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMinor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="DeviceTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ExtraStringLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExtraString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ExtraStringLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: File System Filter '%5' (Version %2.%3, %6) failed to register with Filter Manager. The final status for this operation was %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMajor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMinor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="DeviceTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

Event.Message: File System Filter '%5' (%2.%3, %6) has successfully loaded and registered with Filter Manager.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMajor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMinor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="DeviceTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

Event.Message: File System Filter '%5' (Version %2.%3, %6) failed to start filtering. The final status for this operation was %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMajor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceVersionMinor" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeviceNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="DeviceNameLength"/> <data name="DeviceTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

Event.Message: Filter Manager successfully attached to volume '%3'.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ExtraStringLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExtraString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ExtraStringLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Filter Manager failed to attach to file system control device object (CDO) '%3'. All volumes associated with this file system will be unavailable for filtering until a reboot. The final status was %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ExtraStringLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExtraString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ExtraStringLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Filter Manager successfully attached to file system '%3'.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FinalStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ExtraStringLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ExtraString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ExtraStringLength"/> </template>
